name: Faraway 5
summary:
Set off on a brand new adventure in Faraway: Tropic Escape, exploding with intricate and challenging puzzles set in a tropical idyll, or so it would seem. This is a new room escape experience packed with difficult puzzles, amazing scenery and a great story. Enjoy the tropical installment to one of the all-time best escape games with over a million players. 
 
CAPTIVATING STORY 
 
After awakening from a catatonic state, you set upon a journey to prevent the impending doom that was set in motion by your daughter, Una. You don’t know why, but the answer must lie in Faraway, though only the worthy may go there. 
 
Before you, you'll find difficult and abstract challenges to prove your worthiness, your intelligence, your persistence and other virtues. In a world abstract of time, you will overcome great challenges, drawing from the past to realise your destiny and overcome the wrongs of the past. 
 
Those before you were found unworthy of discovering Faraway; you must tread carefully and intentionally, or else suffer the consequences. Only you are left to find the portal to Faraway and save the world as we know it! 
 
EXCITING LOCATIONS 
 
Navigate through relaxing 3D environments while enjoying an ambient soundtrack. Uncovering secrets have never been so much fun! 
 
INTRICATE PUZZLES 
 
Explore 18 rich levels packed with escape puzzles, explore a 3D world that will captivate you from the moment you begin. Turn, look and explore mind-bending puzzles and contraptions! 
 
THE MYSTERY CONTINUES 
 
Through the missing notes, you can follow your predecessor, who made it past of these vast challenges. Maybe the clue to solving the puzzles lies in the past and solving the puzzles is the only way to protect the future? Only one way to find out! 
 
TRY FOR FREE 
 
Play for free with the option to purchase additional levels and experience the whole Faraway: Tropic Escape story that will leave you longing for more! 
 
Enter an all-new, fascinating location of room escape games & puzzles with Faraway: Tropic Escape!
